templates.content: Unfortunately, we don't use WISELY. The options shown at checkout are credit/debit card, ShopPay, and PayPal.
templates.name: What are you payment options? Do you offer WISELY?

templates.content: You can start your return here: https://annabeck.returnly.com/
templates.name: How do I start a return?

templates.content: Return shipping labels are $6 and will be deducted from your total return amount. Once your return has been submitted and approved through our returns page, you will be emailed your pre-paid return shipping label. If you are exchanging your item then the return label will be free!
templates.name: Do I have to pay to return my item?

templates.content: If returning an order that includes a gift with purchase, be sure to include this item with your return or your refund will be adjusted to reflect the retail price of the free item.
templates.name: Can I return an order that had a free gift with purchase?

templates.content: Gold plated jewelry features layers of gold over a base metal. Our pieces are 18k Gold or Rose Gold plated over solid .925 Sterling Silver.
templates.name: What is gold plated jewelry?

templates.content: In stock items will be processed and shipped within 1-2 business days. Pre-order items will be shipped separately based on the estimated delivery dates listed. You will receive a second 'Out For Delivery' email with tracking information once your pre-order items have been shipped.
templates.name: What if I have both Pre-Order and In Stock items on my order?

templates.content: Once you go through the returns steps online, you will be issued a temporary Instant Refund Credit in the form of an electronic gift card. The Instant Refund Credit will be equal to the value of your returns and gives you the option to place a new order right away, rather than wait for a credit card refund.
templates.name: What is an "Instant Refund Gift Card"?

templates.content: If you're purchasing an item that costs more than the original purchase, you'll have the option to pay the difference during the return/exchange process. If you purchase an item that costs less than the original purchase, then you'll receive a refund for the difference back to the original form of payment.
templates.name: What happens if the item I'm repurchasing costs more or less than the original purchase (Instant refund)?

templates.content: To redeem a reward and get your unique rewards coupon code, you can click Redeem on the desired and earned discount. As soon as a reward is redeemed, your points balance will be adjusted, removing the points cost. A unique reward coupon code is generated and displayed, ready for you to use.
templates.name: How do I redeem my reward points?

templates.content: Not a problem! If you change your mind and instead would like to have your items refunded back to the original form of payment, please continue with sending your item(s) back to us! Once your returning item(s) are checked in, we will deactivate the Instant Refund gift card and issue a refund for any outstanding balance back to your original payment method (or issue an exchange if you requested one).
templates.name: What happens if I donâ€™t use my "Instant Refund''?

templates.content: Thanks for leaving us a review! Feel free to use the code "REVIEW15" at checkout to get 15% off.
templates.name: I left a review, where's my 15% off code?

templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.annabeck.com/collections/sale
templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount

templates.content: You can find us at a store near you here: https://www.annabeck.com/apps/store-locator

templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/annabeckdesigns/  and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/AnnaBeckDesigns/

templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.annabeck.com/pages/shipping-returns
templates.name: Return policy

templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at contact@annabeck.com. Our team is happy to help!
templates.name: Customer support

templates.content: All orders ship from Los Angeles, CA.
templates.name: Where do you ship from?

templates.content: Due to nature's elements, 18k gold plated and sterling silver jewelry can fade or tarnish over time. Avoid contact with water, harsh chemicals, perfume & lotion. We recommend using our two-piece jewelry cleaning cloth to keep your jewelry looking new. To ensure longevity, safely store your pieces in a jewelry box or bag.
templates.name: How do I care for my jewelry?

templates.content: Our pieces are 18k gold or rose gold plated over .925 sterling silver and they don't contain nickel.
templates.name: Does your jewelry contain nickel?

templates.content: You can check out our care instructions here: https://www.annabeck.com/blogs/journal/how-to-clean-your-jewelry
templates.name: How do I clean my jewelry?

templates.content: We have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://www.annabeck.com/pages/rewards
templates.name: Rewards

templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you.
templates.name: Phone support

templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $250. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?
templates.name: Free shipping

templates.content: To make any changes to your order, please email us at contact@annabeck.com. If your order is still in our facility we will do our best to accommodate your request. If your order has already been dispatched, you'll need to start a return once you receive it.
templates.name: Cancel/edit

templates.content: Happy to help! We offer two different ways to determine your ring size, check out our guide here: https://www.annabeck.com/pages/ring-sizing
templates.name: How do I find my ring size?

templates.content: All repairs and restorations are sent back to the original artisans at our workshop in Bali, Indonesia. Please allow a minimum of 10-12 weeks for your item to be restored and returned.
templates.name: How long will it take to repair and/or restore my piece?

templates.content:
If your purchase is beyond one year but within two years of your purchase date, we will process your repair for a fee. All repairs must be linked to the original order number located in our system. The Anna Beck 2- year warranty does not cover accidental damage, negligence, or natural tarnishing that may occur overtime.

To send an item in for repair, please fill out this form: https://www.annabeck.com/pages/submit-a-repair
templates.name: Can I have my item repaired or restored beyond one year?

templates.content: Due to nature's elements, plated and sterling jewelry can fade or tarnish over time. Unfortunately, tarnished jewelry is no longer eligible for repair. We recommend that you visit your local jeweler for replating services, which many offer, which is faster and more economical than sending your piece to our Bali workshop.
templates.name: My older pieces have tarnished over time. Can I send them in to be replated?

templates.content:
Although we do not have single earrings available, we can have the matching mate handcrafted for you at our workshop in Bali.

To begin the process, please fill out our Repair Inquiry Form: https://www.annabeck.com/pages/submit-a-repair  Be sure to include an image of your single earring using the "Upload An Image Button". Once the form is completed, someone from our team will get back to you with next steps including the repair estimate and timeframe.
templates.name: I lost an earring, can I order just one?

templates.content: Pieces purchased on AnnaBeck.com come with a free one-year repair and restoration warranty. This includes but is not limited to broken chains, stone and design defects. Additionally, if your items fall under the 1-year warranty and stock allows, we will replace your item to expedite the 10-12 week repair window. To send an item in for repair, fill out the form below https://www.annabeck.com/pages/submit-a-repair
templates.name: Do you have a repair service?

templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to apply for wholesale is to go here: https://www.annabeck.com/pages/wholesale-customers

templates.content: Glad you're interested in working with us! You can learn more and apply for our ambassador program here: https://www.annabeck.com/pages/ab-ambassadors

templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and we usually ship via UPS. Once shipped it will take 5-7 business days for domestic orders.
templates.name: Shipping time

templates.content: Each piece of our jewelry is handcrafted by artisans in Bali who honor the region's traditional jewelry-making techniques.
templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured?

templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.annabeck.com/collections/sale

templates.content: Unfortunately, we don't offer resizing services. You can take your item to a local jeweler to see if they'll resize.
